## Summary

OpenAI has launched Deep Research, a new feature in ChatGPT that helps conduct multi-step research on complex tasks. While it can synthesize existing information, it does not create new knowledge and its effectiveness depends on the quality of prompts. As AI tools like Deep Research evolve, they may change how analysts gather and interpret information, highlighting the value of both known and unknown data.

## Highlights

- There is so much you learn on the way to a destination, and I value that learning; will serendipity be an unwelcome casualty to reports on demand?
